item.title: About me
item.description:
Background

I was born in Abuja, Nigeria. Studied at Nigerian Turkish International College (now Nigerian ‘Tulip’ Int’l College). currently a final year pharmacy student at the University of Nigeria Nsukka.

My Passion

Learning is a strong passion of mine, I love learning new things, both in the tech world and in the health space, and using that knowledge to help people and solve real problems.

Pharmacist

Currently studying to get my B-pharm degree, I love the innovation in the pharmaceutical industry and aspire to contribute to the sector with my knowledge and skills with technology and programming.
